com.hp.autonomy.frontend.reports.powerpoint

Interface PowerPointService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PowerPointServiceImpl

    public interface PowerPointService
    Primary interface to the PowerPoint API.
    See Also:
    README.md for examples and usage instructions.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • validateTemplate

        void validateTemplate()
               throws TemplateLoadException
        Validates the template used to see if it has the correct slides.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • topicmap

        org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow topicmap(TopicMapData topicmap)
                                             throws TemplateLoadException
        Renders a topic map as a PowerPoint presentation.
        Parameters:
        topicmap - the data representing the topic map paths.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • sunburst

        org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow sunburst(SunburstData sunburst)
                                             throws TemplateLoadException
        Renders a sunburst as a PowerPoint presentation. Only one level of sunburst is supported for now, since it's actually represented by a doughnut chart (based on the first slide in the template).
        Parameters:
        sunburst - the data representing the sunburst.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • table

        org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow table(TableData tableData,
                                                 String title)
                                          throws TemplateLoadException
        Renders a table as a PowerPoint presentation.
        Parameters:
        tableData - the data representing the table.
        title - an optional title.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • map

        org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow map(MapData map,
                                               String title)
                                        throws TemplateLoadException
        Renders a map as a PowerPoint presentation.
        Parameters:
        map - the data representing the map.
        title - an optional title.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • list

        org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow list(ListData documentList,
                                                String results,
                                                String sortBy)
                                         throws TemplateLoadException
        Renders a list of documents as a PowerPoint presentation, similar to how they're rendered in Find. We only support thumbnail images if they're provided as base64 strings to embed into the document, since the POI API doesn't support links to external images.
        Parameters:
        documentList - the data containing all the documents
        results - an optional string which will be shown in the top-left.
        sortBy - an optional string which will be shown in the top-right.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with the list results paginated over multiple slides.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • graph

        org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow graph(DategraphData data)
                                          throws TemplateLoadException
        Renders a date graph as a PowerPoint presentation. This is drawn based on the xy scatterplot chart (which must be contained in the second slide in the template).
        Parameters:
        data - the data representing the graph series to plot.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.

      • report

        org.apache.poi.xslf.usermodel.XMLSlideShow report(ReportData report,
                                                  boolean slidePerVisualizer)
                                           throws TemplateLoadException
        Render a composite report consisting of multiple visualizations as a PowerPoint presentation.
        Parameters:
        report - the data containing a list of visualizations to render.
        slidePerVisualizer - if true, we'll put each visualization on a separate slide.
        Returns:
        a PowerPoint presentation with a single slide.
        Throws:
        TemplateLoadException - if the template is invalid.
